version_description:
TheWorld for iOS v2.1.1 Hungary
What's new in v2.1.1.

[FIX] Problems about DM
[FIX] Many other problems

Thanks

TheWorld for iOS v2.3 Japan
What's new in v2.3

[ADD] User icon Shortcut command
[ADD] Copy URL to paste board to long press
[FIX] Memory Usage
[FIX] Some Problems

Thanks.

TheWorld for iOS v2.2 Ireland
What's new in v2.2

[ADD] Sorting accounts order
[ADD] Add account selection before RT/Fav
[ADD] Changeable color of time and via label
[ADD] Add sample image in case of theme sharing
[ADD] Long push mute user/hashtag in tweet detail
[FIX] Many problems

Thanks.

TheWorld for iOS v2.3.2 Japan
What's new in v2.3.2

[ADD] Header View
[ADD] Account Select Follow

TheWorld for iOS v2.3.4
Add Default Color Theme "PINK".

Thanks
Fixed for iOS7
bug fix
Critical bug fix for iOS8
fixed about auth problem

TheWorld for iOS v3.4

What's new in v3.4.
[Add] iPad Layout!!

What's new in TheWorld v3.5

show quote tweet
show video/gif media
new notification sound

Thanks

What's new in TheWorld v3.6.

Follow Twitter's new specification.

Thanks.
